name: Splinterlands Battle Sim
description:
Splinter lands battle sim is exactly what it sounds like a battle sim to test out many different monsters against each other.

Available Modes:

Sandbox:An unlimited battle sim allowing you to pair up 100s of troops against each other at once

Campaign: 10 Difficult, challenging levels to test out your abilities to figure up good battle setups.

Hotkeys:

-P to pause

-R to reload level

-L to go to menu

-T to switch team in sandbox mode
